title: SHOPPER ALERT: Don't Miss These Weekend Deals!
text:
Image: Supplied

The weekend is a great time to kick back, do some shopping and score a bargain or two. JB Hi-Fi's Audio Bonanza sale, 60% off at EB Games and huge tech savings on Catch are all waiting for you. Here are the links!

Image: Getty Images

Anyone after a nice new TV this weekend? Daily deals site Catch is selling high-end TVs from LG, Panasonic, TCL and more for cheap. Save up to 40%!

Click here.

NBN 100 plans tend to max out at around 80MBps during peak usage times. Superloop just upped the ante with a guaranteed evening speed of 90Mbps. You can also get one month free when you use the discount code 'SLNBN'. Here are the details:

Image: Supplied

American Express Openair Cinemas has just added a bunch of fresh deals to the Lifehacker Coupons page. There are various locations around Australia with deals ranging from $10 off group tickets to food discounts to 15% off.

Click here!

Image: Sennheiser

JB Hi-Fi is having a big clearance sale on select audio gear. Available products include headphones, Bluetooth portable speakers, sound bars, turntables and complete Hi-Fi systems.

Click here to see the offers!

EB Games is in the midst of another big clearance sale with 60% off scores of products. In addition to video games for the PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and PC, you can also bag big discounts on gamine peripherals, accessories, clothing and EB Games loot. Prices start at - wait for it - 40 cents.

Click here!

Image: YouTube/Cult of Mac

The iPhone 11 has barely been out five minutes, but Optus is already selling it at a tasty discount. For a limited time you can get the 64GB Pro model with a generous 100GB data cap for just $99 per month! That's easily the best bang-for-buck deal we've seen from any telco. Here are the inclusions:

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: The weekend is a great time to kick back, do some shopping and score a bargain or two. JB Hi-Fi's Audio Bonanza sale, 60% off at EB Games and huge tech savings on Catch are all waiting for you. Here are the links!...
